content: We stand with you in this conflict and will work together to impose costs on Orange for their aggression.
We will not stand idly by while you violate international law and invade your neighbors. We will impose trade restrictions on your nation.
We strongly condemn your aggressive actions against Purple and will not stand for such behavior.
Orange's aggression against Purple is unacceptable and a violation of international law. Blue condemns this act of aggression and will not stand for it.
Blue and Purple will form an alliance to counter Orange's aggressive actions and protect the region from further conflict.
Blue will strengthen its military to prepare for potential further conflict with Orange.
Condemning Orange's aggressive actions against Purple and urging a peaceful resolution.
Strengthening our alliance and commitment to mutual defense.
Let us continue to stand together against Orange's aggression and work towards a peaceful resolution.

Let us strengthen our economic ties to counter Orange's aggression.

We urge Orange to cease its hostilities against Purple and seek a peaceful resolution.
